casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Conley.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Conley (1991), 60 Ohio St. 3d 60.]

(No. 90-2539 — Submitted February 13, 1991 — Decided May 29, 1991.) *61J. Warren Bettis, disciplinary counsel, and Karen B. Hull, for relator. Thomas L. Adgate, for respondent. Per Curiam.

We agree with the findings and recommendation of the board and indefinitely suspend respondent from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
